Reviews.Title: “The good thing is in California, stuff is slow to decay... like hotel rooms!”

Reviews.Content: hotel basic amenities job quick stay staff actually friendly nice earth translation local twentysomething types somewhat laid attitude plus managers reservations online convenient keys nice classic touch little outdated tube tv simple decor bedding id call shabby simple example king spacious equipped tiny kitchenette stove microwave fridge sink 70s didnt duvet bed plush pillows comfy armchair table 3 sitting chairs bench closet pullout ironing board iron hairdryer request quiet means pool people hang evening hubs stay wine country usually prepared spend 200250 night hotel taxes usual wasnt available indian springs resort spa check werent disappointed john muir mainly crash ready wedding attending spend little downtime reasonable deal napa valley considering wine country premium costs perfect adults busy hiking wine tasting dining shopping spend hotel decent choice budget highway cheap eats nearby chill dont mind wellattended dated atmosphere california stuff slow decay recommend friends simple versus romantic hideaway
